description: Lists the decrypted value of the specified named value of the secret resource. This is a privileged operation.

secret_resource_name.description: The name of the secret resource.

secret_value_resource_name.description: The name of the secret resource value which is typically the version identifier for the value.

value.description: The actual value of the secret.

api_version.description: The version of the API. This parameter is required and its value must be '6.4-preview'.
